subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jaromir Jagr became the oldest N.H.L. player to score at least three times in a game, sparking a rare offensive outburst by the Devils as they beat Philadelphia, 5-2, in Newark on Saturday night.
snippet: Jaromir Jagr became the oldest N.H.L. player to score at least three times in a game, sparking a rare offensive outburst by the Devils as they beat Philadelphia, 5-2, in Newark on Saturday night.
